2. A Word on Method: Moving Beyond Aristotle, Augustine, and Kabbalah


While there is no neutral lens through which to engage the history
of ideas, it is important to guard against three particularly
distorting lenses in the study of Ibn Gabirol: Aristotelian,
Augustinian, and Kabbalistic.
